title: Keyboard isn't shown, so user can't type, if 1-1 chat was deleted and created again [ui-refresh]
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: There is 1-1 chat between 2 people who added each other to Contacts.  Person1 deleted the chat. This cases 2 issues:
1. Person1 can start new chat with the same contact Person2. However, it's not possible to type in this newly started chat because keyboard is not shown if tap in input field
![20172103223720-screenshot](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6584810/24172170/86ba4aa0-0e87-11e7-9c5e-e8f97149b090.png)

2. Person2 has no notification on the "delete" event and continues to write to the "deleted" chat. The messages from Person2 are not shown in the newly created chat to the Person1


#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)
If 1-1 chat was deleted and created again with the same contact then 
1. it's possible to type messages in the newly created chat
2. both contacts receive messages sent to them

#### Actual behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)
If 1-1 chat was deleted and created again with the same contact then 
1. it's not possible to type messages in the newly created chat because keyboard is not shown for Person1 (who deleted initial chat and created new one)
2. Person2 does not see messages sent in new chat by Person1
3. Person1 does not see messages sent to old chat on Person2 device

### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)
Screencast: https://www.screencast.com/t/NEmweNyjhTuA
- Open Status and login
- Start 1-1 chat with any People Contact X (each of participants should send at least 1 message)
- Open Chats
- Tap on Actions icon (in top right corner three dots)
- Tap on Edit
- Tap on Actions icon next to 1-1 chat
- Select Delete chat -> chat will be deleted
- Open Contacts
- Tap on Contact X (the one for which 1-1 chat was just deleted)
- Send a message to the X
- Open Chats
- Tap on chat with X
- Tap on input filed to start writing a message


### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: 0.9.3-25-gf56c421+ (build with epic/ui-refresh branch)
* Operating System: Android

### Log
[20172103223720-logcat.txt](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/859729/20172103223720-logcat.txt)
Not a bug anymore for issue#1: keyboard is shown when person who deleted a chat opens new one. For issue#2 there is #1016
